p: Casuarinin, an ellagitannin, exists in the pericarp of pomegranates ( Punica granatum). In a study by Song et al., casuarinin reduced glutamate-induced HT22 murine hippocampal neuronal cell death by inhibiting ROS production, reducing chromatin condensation, and inhibiting oxidative stress-mediated MAPK phosphorylation ( 71).
